text: do you want something really super fast
and easy to make for dinner now you do I
always do if you're looking for
something really fast and easy why not
go with fish and today I have a great
fish recipe it's halibut and it's
braised in orange juice concentrate and
soy sauce with ginger it's so good the
first thing you want to do is mince up
some garlic two cloves
bigfin of garlic just use three cloves I
feel like I'm just going to say that
every single day I want to encourage you
to improvise a little bit even the most
junior of cooks can improvise if they
feel confident so feel confident and do
a little improvise one tablespoon of
ginger the classic combination of ginger
and garlic peel with a thin side of a
spoon and then just cut off your knob
however big you want you need about one
inch to get a tablespoon of ginger then
thinly slice it into coins then stack up
your little coins and slice it
lengthwise into little shreds and then
once again crosswise cross those little
shreds intimates if you feel like it's
not quite even you can run your knife
back and forth across it just to even
everything out and there you have your
ginger and the last thing you need to

of scallions these are kind of small if
they're really really big use 1/2 a
bunch up to you we like to use the whole

green dark green all of it just thinly
slice it crosswise any pieces that are
cracked or dried out looking or slimy
get rid of those obviously but otherwise
just use the whole thing all set now we
can cook my favorite part heat a little

enough to hold four halibut fillets
about six ounces each and then just take
all of your aromatics the scallions and
then the garlic and ginger too and now
for your fantastic secret ingredient the
orange juice concentrate really adds
such a great flavor and it's a lot

juice regular orange juice has a lot
more water in it so it's going to need
to cook down to get to the
assistance II that you want and if
you're using something that's already
concentrated you don't need to reduce as
much it's kind of cool

make something really delicious
